result.description: The kick-off meeting will be arranged at the beginning of the project to sketch the whole strategy and plan for the STARDUST. result.title: Data Management Plan
result.description: The current deliverable is presented to ensure a proper management of the data generated and processed within STARDUST project to be deposited in a proper way to be findable, accessible, interoperable and reusable (FAIR) as requested by EC. In short, the main objectives of this document are to: â€¢ Properly handle the research data during and after the project â€¢ Describe the required methodology â€¢ Decide whether and how the data will be shared, used or made available for re-use and verification â€¢ Identify how the data are created and how they are going to be preserved
